Usage

Basic usage

Follow the stepper navigation to complete a job request in four easy steps:

  1. Create a submission list by using steps Build your Job and/or Upload csv

  2. Confirm the submission list in the step Submission list

  3. Start protoSpaceJAM in step Jam it

  4. View and download results in the last step Results

Create a submission list

There are two ways to create a submission list:

Build your Job
Select a genome, enter ENST IDs and terminus, adjust on-screen parameters and then click Add to the submission list
Upload csv
Click Download example csv to obtain a template csv file.
Customize the csv file and then click Upload csv to upload.
This method is efficient in uploading a larger submission list.
Notes
Both methods can add to the same submission list repeatedly
Each method can be used repeatedly
In Build your Job, you can click Add to the submission list with a slightly changed configuration

Load an example submission list

There are two options to load an example submission list:

  • Option 1: in step Build your Job, click Load example, and then click Add to the submission list.

  • Option 2: in step upload csv, click Download example csv, and upload by clicking Upload csv.

Confirm submission list

An example of a submission list is shown below, click Confirm to enable launching protoSpaceJAM

Launch protoSpaceJAM

Click Jam it to start processing the submission list

View/Download results
